hadiths.text: Ibn Buraida reported on the authority of his father that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:I forbade you to visit graves, but you may now visit them; I forbade you to eat the flesh of sacrificial animals after three days, but you way now keep it as along as you feel inclined; and I forbade you nabidh except in a water-skin, you may drink it from all kinds of water-skins, but you must not drink anything intoxicating

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِئْذَانِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم رَبَّهُ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ فِي زِيَارَةِ قَبْرِ أُمِّهِ
chapter.eng-name: The prophet (ﷺ) asked his Lord for permission to visit the grave of his mother
